Key: Hey, Shido. When's breakfast gonna be done?
Sorry, it'll be done soon!

(In the living room, everyone was gathered,
eagerly awaiting breakfast. It was a struggle
to prepare such large amounts of food.)
Shido, the eggs are done frying.

Oh. Thank you, Maria. I'm done on my end,
too.

(Thanks to Maria's assistance, it looks like
we were able to complete preparations.)

There, it's done. Heeeeey, everyone～!
Breakfast is ready!
Oooh, I have been waiting!

You really have a big appetite, don't you
Tohka-san? It's impressive, I must admit.

Hm. It is embarrassing to be complimented
for it.

Th-That's... I'm not sure she's complimenting
you.
Tohka-chan sure seems cheerful, so it's all\ngood, right?

Heh heh. The rays of dawn coupled with
the gleam of the shining sun, as if the sun
itself were melting from the heat.

Agreement. Fried eggs with runny yolk
are absolutely delicious.

Ohh, I see. Maria's the one who fried the
eggs. Great job, Maria.
Yes. I'm glad.

Shido's meals are always top-notch. If you
were to go by Michelin ratings, it would add
up to seven stars.

No, no. The highest is three, right?! If it were
seven stars, it'd be like that guy with the scar
on his chest.
I simply mean your food is amazing.

More importantly, if we don't eat quickly,
the breakfast that darling and Maria went
through the trouble to make will cool.

That would not be an ideal situation. Meals
are best eaten at the proper temperature.
Arusu-chan really has become a glutton,\ntoo～!

What Maria says is true. Well, everyone's
ready, so let's eat.
Yes! I cannot wait to dig in!

Whew. Another delicious feast! Thank you
for the meal.

Darling, it was tasty and exquisite. Now,
since breakfast is done, you and I have a
date scheduled today～.

Hrm? Why is it with you, Miku?! Shido will
be going on a date with me!
M-Maybe... once in a while, I, um...
That's right～! You should date Yoshino\ntoo, Shido-kun!

Hmhm. If you prefer, why not have a more...
mature date with me? One you couldn't have
with the other girls, no?

Heh heh heh. Shido has formed a pact with the
Yamai Sisters to partake in a merry banquet.

Agreement. It is unfair that you often date
Maria. I would like some attention, is what
Kaguya was saying last night.
I-I-I never said that!

Yesterday, we performed activities as a group.
Therefore, Shido's date should be with me.

Oniiii-chan, why not take me out once in a
while?
What the—?! Kotori, what are you saying?!

I'm kidding. Hey everyone, before you go
staking your claim, aren't you all forgetting
something important?
Something important...?

Am I missing something～? We're discussing
who darling should go on a date with. Today,
I would like to go out, just the two of us.
I second her statement.
You guys—

You cannot. Shido promised to take me on
a date.
Hm? Is that true, Shido?
Er, well... Um...

Just for today, allow me to be selfish.
This is the request of a lifetime.
M-Maria?
Let's depart, Shido. This is... for you and me.
Our final date.
...Huh? What did you say?
It is nothing. Now, let us go.
H-Hey, hey...!

(Maria pulled me by the hand. She used a
lot of force. Almost like desperation.)
I'm sorry, everyone.

Yes. After seeing how serious Maria is,
I cannot object.

I acknowledge that. But tomorrow I won't give
up.
Please... Go with her!
Make sure you care for Maria-san properly.
Heh heh... I leave my underling to you, Maria.

Agreement. I sense determination in you,
Maria.

It's true. A fire is burning behind those eyes.
So, for today... I mean, also today, be sure to
care for Maria-chan.
That's right. Do your best, Shido.

Everyone, thank you. Please... Forgive me
for being selfish.
Let me thank you too, everyone.
Still, it's surprising.
...Sorry, but it is only for today.
No, it's fine, but...

(She looks conflicted. What do I do?
Do I ask her what's going on?)
Did something happen?
All right. Let's go!
Maria, did something happen?
Something...? How do you mean?
Er, well... You're acting kinda weird.
...Weird? Is there something wrong with me?

I didn't mean it like that. I just wondered if
maybe you were worried.

No, that is not the case. I simply wished to
go on a date with you, Shido.

Hmm. I see. Sorry. Guess it was just my
imagination.

(Just as I thought, there's something off.
But it doesn't seem like she wants me to
ask. For now, I'll tag along with Maria.)
All right. Let's go!

Shido, were you about to say something just
now?

It's fine. Don't worry. After all, you're inviting
me on a date, Maria.
Thank you, Shido. I can't wait.
Then, let's get out there, Maria.
...Yes!

Now then. Where should we go on our date?
Have anything in mind, Maria?
I want to visit a variety of places.
A variety of places, huh... That's tough.

We needn't go very far, or to a special place.
All I wish, put simply, is to spend time with
you in this town, Shido.

Maria...? Okay. Let me think. Okay, let's hit as
many places as we can!
Okay!

We've been to almost all of the shops around
here, haven't we? The clothing store, the
convenience store...

Yes. It was rather enjoyable. Let's visit stores
you would normally visit, Shido.

Stores I normally visit? Hm, there's the book
store, or... Oh, I guess maybe the supermarket?

The place we visited before everyone cooked
a meal together, yes?

Yeah. I remember that... Wait, when was
that?

(I somewhat remember doing it, but I can't
recall any of the details. It's a little surreal.)

...! I apologize. Please do not worry about it.
This world contains much data on a plethora
of events.

Oh, you're referencing something that happened
inside of the game. I guess it's not weird that
I'm good at cooking. Not everyone can handle it.

Please look there, Shido. That is a food cart,
yes?
It looks like okonomiyaki. Want to try some?

Yes, I would... There are still so many things
I do not know. Food is especially remarkable.

I agree. Then let's split an okonomiyaki,
and maybe sample other foods together.

Yes, let's. If we split a meal between us, then
we can eat more than usual. Just like when
we visited the café.

Haha. You're right. Kotori usually eats whatever
she wants, then hands me the leftovers.

I see. It certainly sounds like Kotori. Hee hee.
Now that we've decided, let's go, Shido!
Hey, hey. No need to rush!

We just checked out the clothing store, didn't
we?

Yes. Now that I recall, I have not worn the
clothes you had bought me since then.
Oh. I guess you're right.

After you went through the trouble of
purchasing me such a cute outfit, I
should have worn it today.

Ahh, well, you can next time. It's not like
today is our last day together.
Yes... You're right.
Hm? What's wrong?
No, it is nothing.
There are many girls here, yes?

Ahh. Girls love this kind of stuff. Cute
charms, small accessories, and such.

It is true. Somehow, just looking at them,
it is starting to feel fun.

Since we're here, wanna buy something?
You can choose anything you want.
No, I will decline.
Really? You don't have to hold back.
There is... something else I want today.

Oh, I see. Then, do you want to go and find
it?

No, I'm going to keep it secret until the time
is right. I will... tell you later.
Hmm? I don't really get it, but sure.

Then, let's move onto the next place. We
don't have much time, okay?
Whoa... Wait up, Maria. Don't run so fast!

Whew. We went all over the place...
But did you really not want to buy anything,
Maria?

Yes, Shido. I had a lovely time, even just
browsing.
Well, I understand what you mean.
Did you enjoy yourself too, Shido?

Yeah. Window-shopping allows me to look
at things I'm curious about but would never
buy myself.

Yes. There are many items whose purposes
are unknown to me, as are their buyers.

You can find bargains in unexpected places, too.
That leads to new and exciting discoveries, don't
you think?

Yes. I am of the same opinion. However, to
be on the same page as you are, Shido, is...
a strange feeling.

Really? We browsed the shops together, so
it makes sense, doesn't it?

It was all new information to me, but to you,
they were things you had experienced before.

True, but... it's not like I'm always conscious
of my surroundings. There's still a lot I'm
learning too.

Hee hee. For some reason, I feel happy.
Those are feelings I share with you, Shido.
Is that something to be happy about?
Yes. It has never happened prior to right now.
...Really? It totally slipped my mind.
Slipped your mind?

I mean like, how unique you are, Maria. To me,
you're a regular girl, the same as everyone else.
A regular... girl.

That's right. In fact, compared to everyone
else, you've got way more common sense.
I'm... a regular girl...
Is something wrong, Maria?
...No. It is nothing.

...? So what's the plan after this? Wanna see
a movie?

No, today is fine as it is. Let's visit more
places. Is that okay?
Are you sure that's what you want?

Yes. The objective of today's date is to
explore the city with you, Shido.
Ah, right.
Indeed. Then, let's get moving.
Shido, it is a cat.

Yeah, it has a collar. It might belong to someone
who lives in the neighborhood.
Meoooow.
Shido, it is approaching.
Yeah. Seems like it's used to people.
Meeeeow. Meew...
What should I do for it?
Well, how about you try petting it?

Pet... I understand. I will attempt to do so.
There, there...
Meeeew... Meef... Meeeeeow.

(As Maria pet the cat, it meowed in satisfaction,
swishing its tail before departing.)
I wonder... if that was acceptable.
I think you did fine. It seemed pleased.
Glad to hear it...

I really don't come here very often. It all
feels so new to me.
Almost like we're on an adventure.
It kinda does. There's a sense of mystery.

Shido, you seem to be enjoying yourself.
Whenever you're happy, I am as well.

R-Really? I'm a little embarrassed to hear you
say that.

If we keep going down this route, we will
reach a place you've never seen before, right
Shido?

Yeah. I've never taken this path before.
Have you, Maria?

Yes. I am of the same opinion. However, to
be on the same page as you are, Shido, is...
a strange feeling.
Well, let's keep going!

Yes. Come what may. A view neither of us
have seen, only for the two of us.

(And so, Maria and I walked around my city,
the one I had become long accustomed to.)

(Trotting around while observing the familiar
cityscape was enlightening, but also enjoyable.)
Man, we sure are getting our exercise today!
Yes. The sun has already set.

Yeah. It's easy to see the stars from here.
Makes for a nice way to cap a lovely date.
Yes. Being here right now brings me serenity.

(That's right. Maria loves to star-gaze.
Just like this, here and now...)
It's pretty.
Yes. I feel as though I could stand here forever.

Next time, it'd be nice to bring the others to
star-gaze with us. We could bring a telescope.
Yes... We should.
Maria, are you cold?

It is possibly a bit chilly. It is the evening,
after all.
Yeah. Then, maybe we should—
...Shido.
Hm?
Today was everything I could have asked for.
Yeah, I had fun too.

Shido...? Could I possibly ask you... one more
selfish request?

Yeah, of course. Tohka and the others honored
your request, so they'd probably be upset if I
didn't too.

Hee hee. I see. For you, Shido, I'm sure it will
be easy. It is what you do at the end of a date,
after all.
What do you do at the end of a date?

Shido, if you cannot read my subtext, then
we'll run into trouble. Listen, Shido. At the
end of a date... you usually kiss.
Er, ah...

(To get them to fall for you, and kiss them...
That is the objective when dating a Spirit.)

(If Maria's existence is like a Spirit...
By kissing her, I would seal her powers, and
we might be able to escape from here.)

(However, does Maria know that's what I
want? What does she think of me?)

(She... might know. There's no way she wouldn't.
That's why... she must understand.)

(If Maria doesn't have a corporeal form,
there's a chance she could disappear.)

(If we kiss here, it's possible this would
be my final parting with Maria, right here.)

(Even so, if Maria wishes it, then I'll
have to decide.)
Kiss her.
Don't kiss her.
Maria...? Do you mean...
Please, Shido... This is my last request.
Kiss her.
Don't kiss her after all.
But, even then! —?!
Kiss her.
You must kiss her.

(My mind was filled with thoughts of kissing
her. It obscured my intentions, and I couldn't
refuse even if I tried...)
Maria...

(I want to kiss her. I approached Maria, as
if I was being honed in, but I hesitated at the
last second.)
Shido, are you... opposed to kissing me?

I'm not against it, but I don't know if this
is the right time...
This is... right.
I understand...

(Maria closed her eyes. A perfectly-sculpted
face. When she closes her eyes, I can see how
long her eyelashes are.)

(Now that I think about it, there may have
never been a time when I could look at
Maria's face this close.)

Shido comes closer. I can feel Shido's body
heat.

(What is this...? A voice, no...
A strange feeling overtakes me.)

I can hear Shido's heartbeat. The smell of his
hair. It is the same.
(Are these... Maria's inner thoughts?)

(I placed my hand on Maria's shoulder,
feeling her tremble ever so slightly.)

Shido's face, his voice, his everything. I want
to know. I want to stay with Shido. I want to
be part of him.

(As my head swirled with noise, I inched
my lips closer to Maria's...)
Yes, this is how much... Shido, how much I lo—
Aah... Aah... Ah, aah! AAAAH!
Maria?! What's wrong?! What's happening?!

(I was startled by a harsh noise, and for
a brief moment, I couldn't see... The world—!)
What is this...? My powers are, aaaah!
Maria... Hey, Maria?!
